com.mesosphere.sdk.http

Class EndpointUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.http.EndpointUtils

  • public class EndpointUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities relating to the creation and interpretation of endpoints between DC/OS tasks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EndpointUtils.VipInfo
      Simple data container representing information about a task VIP entry.

      • replaceDotsWithDashes

        public static java.lang.String replaceDotsWithDashes(java.lang.String name)
        "hello.kafka" => "hello-kafka". Used for values in autoip hostnames. Unlike with VIPs and mesos-dns hostnames, dots are converted to dashes with autoip hostnames. See DCOS-16086.
